description.p: Dynamically change the watermark text for a control that supports watermarks.
The text to display for the watermark.

discussion.p: A new method has been added to controls that have a watermark property that allows you do dynamically change the watermark text.
For example, say you have a control called 'LASTNAME' and you want to set its watermark property.

tip.p: To get the unicode encoded value of a string you can go to the Tools menu when the Web Control panel has focus and select the *[ui:Open text encoder window]* menu command. The encoded string contain unicode encoded values of the form *[js:{unicode}####]* where "####" is the unicode value (e.g. "00E9" or "FFFD") and "{unicode}" is a placeholder for "\u", which you must manually replace.
